biography.bio: Gertraud Jesserer was born on December 13, 1943 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Taxi für eine Leiche (2002), Ravioli (2003) and Merry-Go-Round (1973).
biography.name: Gertraud Jesserer

biography.bio: Karlheinz Hackl was born on May 16, 1949 in Vienna, Austria. He was an actor and director, known for Le mur invisible (2012), Sophie's Choice (1982) and Taxi für eine Leiche (2002). He was married to Maria Köstlinger and Brigitta Furgler. He died on June 1, 2014 in Vienna.
biography.name: Karlheinz Hackl

biography.bio: Brigitte Kren was born on January 27, 1954 in Graz, Austria. She is an actress, known for Quatuor pour une enquête (2005), The Debt (2010) and Rammbock (2010).
biography.name: Brigitte Kren

biography.placeOfBirth: Ybbs an der Donau, Lower Austria, Austria
biography.bio: Karl Fischer was born on December 8, 1956 in Ybbs an der Donau, Lower Austria, Austria. He is an actor, known for Commissaire Brunetti (2000), Gloomy Sunday (1999) and Trois jours à vivre (2006). He is married to Susi Stach. They have two children.
biography.name: Karl Fischer

biography.bio: Lars Rudolph was born on August 18, 1966 in Wittmund, Lower Saxony, Germany. He is an actor, known for Run Lola Run (1998), Les Harmonies Werckmeister (2000) and The Princess and the Warrior (2000).
biography.name: Lars Rudolph

biography.placeOfBirth: St. Veit an der Glan, Carinthia, Austria
biography.bio: Libgart Schwarz was born on January 25, 1941 in St. Veit an der Glan, Carinthia, Austria. She is an actress and writer, known for The Goalie's Anxiety at the Penalty Kick (1972), The Ortlieb Woman (1981) and Malina (1991). She was previously married to Peter Handke.
biography.name: Libgart Schwarz

biography.bio: Bibiane Zeller was born on February 25, 1928 in Vienna, Austria. She is an actress, known for Julia - Eine ungewöhnliche Frau (1999), Die Ameisenstraße (1995) and Die Spätzünder (2010).
biography.name: Bibiane Zeller

biography.bio: Peter Neubauer is an actor, known for Taxi für eine Leiche (2002), The Uppercrust (1981) and Schloß mit späten Gästen (1982).
biography.name: Peter Neubauer

biography.placeOfBirth: Maishofen bei Zell am See, Austria
biography.bio: Gottfried Breitfuss was born on December 17, 1958 in Maishofen bei Zell am See, Austria. He is an actor, known for The Princess and the Warrior (2000), Struggle (2003) and My Brother the Vampire (2001).
biography.name: Gottfried Breitfuss

biography.bio: Herb Andress was born in upper Austria, and always intended to become an actor. In 1957 he moved to France, appeared there in Chaque jour a son secret (1958) and in 1961 moved to New York, then later to San Francisco. He worked with Elena Williams in Las Vegas and Los Angeles in an act that became well known as "The Magical Dolls". He spent two years at a workshop at Columbia Pictures under teachers like Ida Lupino, Ralph Nelson and Charlton Heston. His first credits were under the name Herbert Andreas, and he often played Germans in the classic war series Combat! (1962), and soon began to get better parts. He moved to to Rome in 1968, and began a second career under the name Herb Andress in international movies. He lives now in Germany.
biography.name: Herb Andress

biography.bio: Hannes Fretzer was born on March 8, 1965 in Vienna, Austria. He is an actor and director, known for The Unfish (1997), The Final Barrier (2016) and Taxi für eine Leiche (2002).
biography.name: Hannes Fretzer

biography.bio: Jazz Freddy is an actor, known for Taxi für eine Leiche (2002).
biography.name: Jazz Freddy

biography.bio: Klaus Ortner was born in 1960. He is an actor and writer, known for Hold-Up (2000), Silentium (2004) and Fils de pute (2004).
biography.name: Klaus Ortner

biography.bio: Edmund Jäger was born on March 11, 1967 in Salzburg, Austria. He is an actor, known for The Shaman (2015), Dreynschlag (2003) and Ainoa (2005).
biography.name: Edmund Jäger

biography.bio: Peter Faerber was born on July 1, 1953 in Linz, Upper Austria, Austria. He is an actor, known for Tom Turbo (1993), Terra Mater (2011) and North Face (2008).
biography.name: Peter Faerber
